snippet.title: Blazing Souls Accelate Trailer
snippet.description:
Blaze your way with the epic SRPG for the PSP!

The story begins with Zelos, the amnesiac making his living as an independent contractor. One day he finds a mysterious stone infused with a powerful magic known as the Core Elemental. As he takes on more missions with his motley crew of companions, he encounters the Human Genomes—new creatures created by God to replace mankind.

Available October 19 2010.

For more information, visit:
http://www.aksysgames.com
